General Information

Cold Cream Lip balm for dry and chapped lips

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only.

Ingredients

Cleanance MAT Mattifying Toner, 200ml

Directions

Apply onto lips as often as needed.
